channel.title: AwakenPS Custom server [working guns] [New custom npcs] [Growing constantly]
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.hizliresim.com/j576Pm.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://awaken-ps.com"]Fourms[/URL] -----[URL=http://"http://awaken-ps.com/AwakenV3.3.jar"]Download client[/URL] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tPZoNya.png[/img]
AwakenPS is a custom server coded by Nick. This server is NOT Pay 2 win. Any item can be obtained via killing monsters or building them. Feel free to drop by and have a great time![/CENTER] [SPOILER=Server videos][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TKHsKOzPHAw&feature=youtu.be]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TKHsKOzPHAw&feature=youtu.be[/url][/SPOILER]
Note: You need the new client to be able to play. You can download it [URL=http://"http://awaken-ps.com/AwakenV3.3.jar"]Here[/URL] [SPOILER=3.3 Update! New customs] [img]http://i.imgur.com/krpkAus.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Qqq0Jdb.png[/img]
New npcs [img]http://i.imgur.com/54s3vBp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6yLpJI0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Hw7ykqV.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[/MOD][/SPOILER] [/MOD] [MOD=Features]
[ul][*] Upgrading Feature [*]Not Pay 2 win [*]Easy to get customs [*]Easy start [*]Custom Bosses [*]Many zones [*]5-10 on [*]Helpful staff [*]Prestige system [*]Nice Community [*] Unique dicing with anti scam [*]Vps hosted [*]Website with domain [*]Full screen feature [*]And much more! [*] Working guns [*]Unseen Customs[/ul]
[/MOD]
[SPOILER=Media][MOD=Media] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2LR3O3x.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/V8P2lMV.png[/img] Home NEW CUSTOM SPECS (Chaotic whip and ice katana) [img]http://i.imgur.com/yzVOqYb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/t25K8H6.png[/img] Asguardian boss and titans [img]http://i.imgur.com/mX5WiZR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/T4OkbeO.png[/img] [COLOR="#FF0000"]A UNIQUE DICING SYSTEM[/COLOR] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HgcwvWs.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GaCsXyw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/d8BcnM2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OBBDYXx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tmtLcqr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oLgkYwJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lJt2dPY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VTE8Ugj.png[/img] Prestige system (with shop) [img]http://i.imgur.com/LD2stul.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PB6Tv34.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/abShIvN.png[/img] Many zones to teleport to [img]http://i.imgur.com/HH4UHvY.png[/img] Custom Drop rates with annoucment [img]http://i.imgur.com/t36rIqI.png[/img] Many monsters to kill [img]http://i.imgur.com/pcjFyxf.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pM1GqY7.png[/img] CUSTOM BOSSES! [img]http://i.imgur.com/bqGErqo.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Xa43wBm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0WWO9LW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rQ6UatM.png[/img] Skilling zone [img]http://i.imgur.com/XmPtYvy.png[/img] Nice players [img]http://i.imgur.com/yDTDHwJ.png[/img]
[/MOD] [/SPOILER] [MOD=Updates] Just posted 6/4/2015 Will post updates as they come
6/5/2015 Hired a fourm administrator (Ramon) 6/8/2015 Added auth voting system 6/10/2015 Added Titans , Asguardian boss and unique dicing system 6/17/2015 Added custom titles , multi bossing , tradeable donator rank , 1b ticket shop 6/18/2015 Added Custom specs to weps and trivia system 6/18/2015 Bought a teamspeak server 6/20/2015 - Added Tradable Donator Tickets - Many minor bugs fixed - Made Items stackable - 1b Ticket shop now at ::home - Added Tradable Custom titles - Custom Titles can now be bought from donator shop - Asgaurdian beast has been moved to a mutlizone NEW CUSTOM SPECS (Chaotic whip and ice katana) 6/23/2015 added 2 new torvas Added a Upgrading feature to server Gave some items stats Rebuffed customs 7/1/2015 3.3 updates [/MOD] [COLOR="#FF0000"]See somthing wrong? [/COLOR] The server is build on your suggestions. So Leave a suggestion on fourms or hit me up here and ill work on it to get it fixed

item.title: AwakenPS Custom server [working guns] [New custom npcs] [Growing constantly]
item.dc:creator: @furyking50 furyking50
item.description:
@furyking50 wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Looks like a Dreamscape remake. Doesn’t look like anything special other than the fact you added a few customs to get kids to jizz at the bright colours.

lol more like the source… Project-Nightmare not dreamscape

Read full topic

item.title: AwakenPS Custom server [working guns] [New custom npcs] [Growing constantly]
item.dc:creator: @Ykcud Ykcud
item.description:
@Ykcud wrote:

I will save some of you looking for servers some time. Despite what is said in the ad, this IS a pay to win server. It does not matter if the items bought with real money is or is not obtainable in game, they are still being bought, hence PAY to win.

Read full topic
